item.title: Where can I query the UTXO database?
item.description:
Where can I query the UTXO database?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required. Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top Currently there are 35 million unspent transaction outputs.

item.title: SAW Inspired Bitcoin Ransomware Deletes Files Every Hour
item.description:
SAW Inspired Bitcoin Ransomware Deletes Files Every Hour

Jigsaw, a SAW movie inspired bitcoin ransomware deletes files if demands are not met. Billy the Puppet from the same movie is the face of Jigsaw. Read more... A group of online hackers is using their sense-of-humor - and an indisputable love for Saw movie series - to rob people off their Bitcoin.

item.title: Disrupt Conference - What is Bitcoin?
item.description:
Disrupt Conference - What is Bitcoin?

In this short, "TED style" talk, Andreas delivers an introduction to bitcoin for a general non-technical audience. Delivered in Athens in November of 2013, this is one of the most shared bitcoin videos, an easy way to explain bitcoin to anyone.

item.title: Factom - Big Data on the Bitcoin Blockchain - BnkToTheFuture Case Study
item.description:
Factom - Big Data on the Bitcoin Blockchain - BnkToTheFuture Case Study

http://bit.ly/1AJOQiZ Ever wondered what it would be like if you couldn't prove your home, or even the land it's built on, was actually yours? Ever pondered what happens to your data when you share it online, with your bank or with your government?

item.title: Owner Moves Bitcoin Exchange Out of Estonia After Landmark Supreme Court Decision
item.description:
Owner Moves Bitcoin Exchange Out of Estonia After Landmark Supreme Court Decision

BTC.ee owner alleges threats by Estonian police and moves business out of the country as Supreme Court of the country on Monday ruled against Bitcoin in a landmark case. BTC.ee recently announced closure over threats by the Estonian police.

item.title: San Diego Sees 2 New Bitcoin ATMs
item.description:
San Diego Sees 2 New Bitcoin ATMs

With an announcement, Bitcoin ATM network Coinsource has installed two more Bitcoin ATMs in San Diego County, in addition to one existing ATM. San Diego now sees three bitcoin ATMs active in the County operated by Coinsource.

item.title: The Power of Schnorr: The Signature Algorithm to Increase Bitcoin's Scale and Privacy
item.description:
The Power of Schnorr: The Signature Algorithm to Increase Bitcoin's Scale and Privacy

Segregated Witness has entered its final testing stage before roll-out on the Bitcoin network. That is good news, most importantly because the innovation introduces a capacity increase to allow for more transactions on the network, while it also solves transaction malleability.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: 4/14/2016
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: 4/14/2016

Bitcoin is still undergoing a correction towards the upward trend. Will that trend continue or should we expect a turn to decline followed by a sharp fall? Bitcoin's current rebound may likely grow into a turnaround. The current price is profitable for the bulls.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Battle Near Resistance
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Battle Near Resistance

Bitcoin price kept within its corrective range around $425 Bitstamp today. As has become the daily pattern during 2016, the bulls and bears are fighting for dominance and the current wave's direction. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member?
